title: Police: Teen accidentally shoots himself in S.E. Oklahoma City
content:
OKLAHOMA CITY – Emergency were called to reports of a shooting in southeast Oklahoma City.
When police arrived on scene, they learned that a 16-year-old boy accidentally shot himself in the shin inside his home near S.E. 80th and Sooner Rd. around 11:45 a.m. Friday.
The teen is expected to be okay.
Police say his injury is not life-threatening.
This is a developing story. Check back for updates.
